content: materials - 3 skeins of purl soho s worsted twist 1 100% merino wool each skein is 164 yards/ 100 grams approximately 492 yards required we used red plum - us 8 5 mm circular or straight needles 3 gauge 17 stitches and 30 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern size finished dimensions 10 inches wide x 68 inches long 1 https //www purlsoho com/worsted-twist html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796_23802
